articles.title: Hisense Launches 3 New Full-Array QLED TVs in India, Prices Start at Rs. 59,990 - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Hisense on Thursday launched its three new full-array QLED TVs in India. Called the Hisense 55U6G, Hisense 65U6G, and Hisense 75U80G, the new QLED TVs come with Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos support and run on Android TV 10 out-of-the-box.
articles.content: Hisense on Thursday expanded its range of smart QLED TVs in India by launching its new models that feature full array local dimming backed by Quantum Dot technology. The built-in technology is claime… [+3538 chars]

articles.title: Noise ColorFit Ultra, ColorFit Brio, Air Buds Mini get massive discounts during Noise Diwali Sale - India Today
articles.description: Noise is offering scores of deals and discounts on some of its products during the Noise Diwali sale.
